comment.body: @Styromaniac: Yeah, any idea how to reproduce it?
Thanks for reporting I was able to reproduce and fix it in Rev3739
Please try to update in latest Rev, there a bugfix in Rev3737 that affects the muting feature

Probably this is a limitation in Chrome and multi-threaded db will not improve on this: Chrome allows only 6 pending requests per host. So if you have a site that includes 6 unreachable/slow optional files, then the Chrome will block all requests until that 6 one times out. Firefox handles these situations better. (cancels when you navigate away from the page)
Please try to update to the latest version, this should be fixed in Rev4372
